title: Random summoner icon
body: Hello, recently got a summoner icon from riot. It is little devil teemo smiling. None of my friends seem to have it or change theirs to it. Thanks for reading, if you have any idea what this is please feel free to reply.  :D

replies.body: That's the little devil teemo icon that you received for defeating doom bots.  Check out our [Teemoing event page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) for more details on some mischevious icons.  Congrats!  :D
Thanks! I already got the other icon XD.
